# Pull Request

Thank you for contributing to **Nagada**.  
Before submitting, please confirm the checklist below.

---

## Summary

> Provide a short description of what this PR changes or adds.  
> (1â€“3 sentences preferred.)

---

## Type of Change

Select one:

- [ ] Spec update (clarification, restructure, additional detail)
- [ ] Breaking change proposal
- [ ] New feature / extension proposal
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Conformance test update or addition
- [ ] Refactoring / cleanup
- [ ] Other (please describe):

---

## Motivation

> Why is this change needed?  
> (Link issue/discussion if relevant.)

---

## Related Documents

- Issue/Discussion Link (if applicable):  
- Sections modified or referenced (e.g., `spec/04-wire-format.md`):

---

## Implementation Notes (if applicable)

> If this PR includes reference code, SDK work, or examples, describe relevant choices here.
> Optional for pure spec modifications.

---

## âœ”ï¸ Checklist

Please verify:

- [ ] I have reviewed the **philosophy and goals** documents to ensure alignment.
- [ ] My change maintains or improves **interoperability** across implementations.
- [ ] I used exact normative language (`MUST`, `SHOULD`, `MAY`) where applicable.
- [ ] No existing statements were changed without justification.
- [ ] I confirmed formatting consistency (Markdown tables, headings, schema blocks).
- [ ] I have checked for accidental breaking changes.

Optional if code/examples included:

- [ ] Tests updated or added (if needed)
- [ ] No hard-coded values or environment-specific logic
